entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Snow near the Nunavut border early this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain showers beginning late in the evening then changing to a few flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 10 April 2023
